snippet.title: HELI-COMMANDO 2017 - PC Gameplay (Steam)
snippet.description:
HELI-COMMANDO 2017 is a retro arcade helicopter game in C64 style like the games in the 80s. Fly a helicopter and rescue people, cats and collect diamonds and many more types of several objects to gather the highscore of the game.

Developed and published by RF

#steam #steamgames #steamgame #retrogames #retrogaming #helicommando #helicommando2017

FUN FACT: While it kinda looks a bit naff, this game does go on sale for about 49 cents, where it usually costs 79 cents. Not expensive to begin with, but hey, this does have pretty challenging achievements. Also, even though the game does support gamepads, it apparently doesn't work on controllers that use the version of X-Input used for Xbox One controllers. Maybe it was made with the Xbox 360 era controllers in mind?
